title: IN PICTURES: Crowds gather for peaceful protest at Galle Face
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); People are continuing to protest opposite the President’s Office as of currently.
According to News 1st reporters, the protesters have completely blocked the Galle road, while a group of Red Cross officials have also arrived at the protest site.
Moreover, a special Ambulance service organized by Sarvodaya is also stationed in Galle Face premises, to support the protestors if the need arises.
It is up to the President to take a honorable political turn: Anuruddha Somatunga
